trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipula o <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List.ItemDataBind"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicativos móveis, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) site da Web.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control contains a collection of items.
These items are of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> class.

When providing default rendering, the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control represents a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> object using its <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ao fornecer processamento padrão, o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>controlar representa um <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>objeto usando seu <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>

trans-unit.source: In templated rendering, the template can render any desired property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem> object or associated data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: Na renderização de modelo, o modelo pode processar qualquer propriedade desejada de um <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>objeto ou objeto de associação de dados associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileListItem>

trans-unit.source: When you create a ListDataBindEventHandler delegate for a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um delegado de ListDataBindEventHandler para um <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>controle, que você identificar o método que manipula o evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List> control notifies the handler when an item event is generated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>controle notifica o manipulador quando um item de evento é gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.List>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: A menos que você remova o representante, o manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre.
